page.description: If the Grid's 'RowEditStyle' is set to 'RowOnDemand', puts the specified row into edit mode.

argument.name: rowNumber
argument.description: The number of the row that you want placed in edit mode.

argument.name: field
argument.description: The field on the row to be edited.

page.discussion: Focus is set to the specified field (field must be uppercase, with spaces in the fieldname replaced with underbar). This method is equivalent to double clicking on a particular field in a Grid row to edit that field.
